title: Prank-O Original Gift Box, Wrap Your Real Present in a Funny Authentic Prank-O Gag Present Box, Novelty Gifting for Pranksters, Shark Tank (Roto Wipe)
features: Prank Boxes at first appear to contain bizarre products from ridiculous companies.

Prank-O's Original Prank Gift Box - We pride ourselves on our incredible attention to detail. We have thought of everything from the ridiculous fictional product itself, to the hilarious images and detailed product description.
Add the Gift of Laughter to the party with this quirky and fun twist on the timeless tradition of fun gag gift giving for boyfriend, girlfriend, mom, dad or kids.

High Quality - made in the USA of 100% recyclable cardboard. Our boxes ship flat and are easy to assemble – no glue or extra steps required. At 11.25” x 9” x 3.25” they are the perfect size for almost all funny gag gifts! Made in the U.S.A.

PLEASE NOTE. This is an EMPTY prank GIFT BOX. Actual Squat & Trot is not included. This is a flat, empty box, meant to put your real present inside and prank your friends and family. Perfect Christmas Gift Box.
keywords: prank pack prank-o original gift box
